byline.contributor: Ceylan Yeginsu contributed reporting from Istanbul.

abstract: Similarities between personal and political styles of Turkish Pres Recep Tayyip Erdogan and Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin threaten to further inflame tensions between two countries as they struggle over conflicting interests in Syria and react to Turkish military's downing of Russian warplane; both leaders are very conscious of their political status, like to take risks, and view any appearance of weakness as debilitating.
lead_paragraph: Not long ago, Recep Tayyip Erdogan, the president of Turkey, earned about the warmest accolade possible from President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia. That was then.

headline.main: Discord Between Turkey and Russia Is Fueled by Leaders’ Similarities
headline.print_headline: Similar Styles of 2 Presidents Fuel Tensions

snippet: Not long ago, Recep Tayyip Erdogan, the president of Turkey, earned about the warmest accolade possible from President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia. That was then.
